text: Indian shares gained, with the key indices extending their record run, in a rally paced by shares of oil and gas explorers.The S&P BSE Sensex rose as much as 0.5 percent to 35,700 and the NSE Nifty 50 Index gained as much as 0.2 percent to 10,929.Thirteen out of 19 sector gauges compiled by BSE were trading higher, led by the S&P BSE Energy Index's 1.2 percent jump. On the other hand, the S&P BSE Telecom Index was the top sectoral loser, down 0.6 percent.
title: Stocks Radar: Apollo Micro Systems, ONGC, RIL, J.Kumar InfraProjects
